headline: REITs Signal Their Self-Valuation With Capital Activity
summary: REITs in 2025 are showing smarter capital moves, issuing equity at premiums, buying back undervalued shares, and cheap debt. See why investor discipline is paying off.

headline: How Horace Mann Educators, VICI Properties, And Flowers Food Can Put Cash In Your Pocket
summary: Companies with a long history of paying dividends and consistently hiking them remain appealing to income-focused investors. Horace Mann Educators, VICI Properties, and Flowers Foods have rewarded shareholders for years and recently announced dividend ...
